::: {#hero-heading}

I am an Assistant Professor of Teaching in the [Department of Statistics](https://www.stat.ubc.ca/) as well as a member of the academic team for the [Master of Data Science Program](https://ubc-mds.github.io/) at the University of British Columbia. My work focuses on modern pedagogical methods in statistics and data science. I am passionate about academic outreach, with a focus on promoting women in data science and addressing equity issues in the statistical sciences.

### Education

+ PhD in Statistics | University of Alberta, 2023

+ MSc in Statistics | University of Calgary, 2019

+ BSc in Mathematics | MacEwan University, 2017
